resources.string:
Welcome to the Iriana Garage app, a trusted motorbike rental application frequently used by many people, offering affordable rates at : 
40,000 rupiah per hour for 12 hours.


However, if you rent for 1 - 2 days, you will receive a discount. The longer your rental duration, the greater the discount you will receive. So lets rent a motorbike for your needs. Please choose the motorbike you want to rent.

Order Quantity: %1$s Pcs 
Vehicle Type: %2$s 
Usage Duration: %3$s 
Total Price: Rp %4$s

Iriana Garage is a Motorcycle Rental Android Application where this application makes it easier for admins and customers in ordering motorcycle rentals so that customers no longer need have to communicate with the admin via wa or others.


This application was created for Asessment 1 Mobpro. 
Copyright Â© 2021 - 2024 Gari Iriana. 
All rights reserved.
